subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jay Bruce went 3 for 3 in his eagerly awaited debut Tuesday night and Adam Dunn hit a milestone three-run homer, leading the host Cincinnati Reds to a 9-6 victory over the Pittsburgh Pirates.
snippet: Jay Bruce went 3 for 3 in his eagerly awaited debut Tuesday night and Adam Dunn hit a milestone three-run homer, leading the host Cincinnati Reds to a 9-6 victory over the Pittsburgh Pirates.
